title: Beacon's Call 6
author: Adventurer H. C.
pages: The pyramid awaits, its metallic tiers promising untold rewards. The beacon nestles lovingly atop its new throne.
Carefully, I set it. The magic surges forth as light pierces the sky, a signal to all corners of the world.
I feel an aura rush over me, its gift empowering, rejuvenating. A fortress of energy at my command.
All hardships fade beneath its illuminating presence. Adventurer's heart swells with pride for the beacon's call answered.
